attributes.action: referendum to  Leave the European union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of this country should be given the chance to have a referendum to stay or leave the European Union,we give millions of pounds every year to the European Union,the government of this country are losing all there powers , most of the laws of this country are made through the European Union ,What are the benefits of staying in the European union?,jobs,trade.what are the benefits of leaving the European Union,we would not be giving away millions of pounds every year,the government once again could make the laws of this country,we would still trade with European countrys,Prisons would become once again prisons and not holiday camps,we would have full control over immigrants coming to live in this country .we would still be a member of Nato,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
